definition: any projection that is thought to resemble a human arm, to divide into two or more branches so as to form a fork
details:
noun
- any projection that is thought to resemble a human arm
= synonyms: arm
- a division of some larger or more complex organization
= example: a division of some larger or more complex organization
= synonyms: subdivision
- a stream or river connected to a larger one
- a natural consequence of development
= synonyms: offset, outgrowth, offshoot
- a division of a stem, or secondary stem arising from the main stem of a plant
- a part of a forked or branching shape
= example: a part of a forked or branching shape
= synonyms: leg
verb
- to divide into two or more branches so as to form a fork
= example: to divide into two or more branches so as to form a fork
= synonyms: fork
- to grow and send out branches or branch-like structures
= example: to grow and send out branches or branch-like structures
= synonyms: ramify
